name: mgc-calendar
description: Universal calendar manager with import/export, tags, and status tracking - no OAuth required
long_description: MGC Calendar Manager lets Claude create, update, and delete calendar events using standard ICS files. Works with any calendar application (Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar) without requiring API keys or OAuth setup. Features include bulk import/export (ICS/JSON), event tagging, scheduled vs published status tracking, web dashboard with visual calendar views, and LinkedIn integration. All events are tracked locally with full CRUD operations.
